name: bridge
description: Capture and analyze experiential moments for better distributed cognition between humans and AI.
long_description: Drawing from research in embodied cognition, micro-phenomenology, and extended mind theory, Bridge transforms raw experience into computationally accessible data.

data_file_path.title: Bridge Data File
data_file_path.description: Path to your Bridge experiential data file (bridge.json). This file stores all your captured moments and experiences.
data_file_path.help_text: Leave empty to use the default location in your home directory, or specify a custom path to your bridge.json file.

debug_mode.title: Debug Mode
debug_mode.description: Enable debug logging for troubleshooting and search operations

tools.name: capture
tools.description: Capture experiential moments with seven-dimensional phenomenological analysis (embodied, attentional, affective, purposive, spatial, temporal, intersubjective)

tools.name: search
tools.description: Search experiences using multi-modal relevance: text matching, phenomenological vector similarity, semantic meaning, and contextual filters

tools.name: enrich
tools.description: Iteratively deepen experiential records through reflection, adding new insights while preserving original capture

tools.name: release
tools.description: Release experiential records back to consciousness flow (delete), acknowledging some moments need to be let go
